summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to fire and explosion hazard; adopting the Uniform Fire Code and amendments thereto as the Seattle Fire Code; providing for the Administration thereof; requiring permits and fixing fees and repealing Ordinances 87870, 88210, 88339, 98964, 90005, 90405, 91984, 92898, 93220, 93733, 93826, 94931, 96018, 96169, 96677, 98466, 98572, 98868, 101645, 103133, 103457, 105617, and all other ordinances in conflict herewith.
